title: Can't acess PBE..
body:
I was accepted into PBE and was able to make an account on step 3, but on step 4 when I downloaded the PBE file and followed all the steps to make sure it doesn't mess up, it takes me to the regular North American Patcher (With the options to switch within regions.) I also cant log into the PBE discussion because it says I have to log in to my account first. 
 I've had trouble with this for about a week now and I have already posted a discussion in help and support.  http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/LJ6f3wgG-how-do-i-get-into-pbe-servers  



I really want to be able to test out the new things and actually try out the new Zac skin. So please let me know as soon as possible. Thanks.

replies.body:
Hey penguinhedgehog, 

The following are the steps to install the PBE client - 

* Download the Windows PBE client [here](http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/PBE/PBE_Client_Shell.zip).
* Open "PBE_Client_Shell.zip"
* Copy and paste the entire PBE folder anywhere on your PC **except the directory you're using for your main League of Legends installation**. Hosting the PBE files and the main League of Legends files in the same directory has been reported to cause problems.
* Double click on "lol.launcher.exe" or "lol.launcher.admin.exe" to run the launcher and start patching.

Did you happen to accidentally install it in your main League of Legends directory? Or did you perhaps launch the live client.

If this all went successfully, you'll be able to launch the PBE client. It looks super similar to the live client, so take a look in the upper left hand corner, and you should see it say "PBE" as opposed to "North America" or another region. 

In regards to not being able to log in to the PBE boards, is it possible the PBE was down for maintenance? Sometimes, the boards become unavailable during that time. Also, double check that you're using your PBE username/password, as opposed to the login information you'd use on your live account. 

If you're still having issues after checking out the info above, please submit a [Player Support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) and we'll be able to troubleshoot with you a bit more to get you set up for the PBE!

Bakru, I've already extracted the file whenever the file whenever I downloaded the PBE windows client, but thanks anyways.


Riot KateyKhaos, It keeps taking me to regular LoL client. I honestly don't know why it keeps doing that, whether there is something that I'm missing with my computer, or there is something else that I am completely overlooking. (I do that a lot) As to the boards problem, this keeps coming up _"You must first create a Summoner by logging into League of Legends before logging into our website."_ 

Anyways, I'll keep looking into it and I'll let you all know as soon as I figure out what is happening. Thanks for the help though. I'll put in a ticket for now, but I have a feeling that my computer might be part of the problem.
(I'll keep at this until I get to Pool Party Zac, so that's going to be a lonoooong time. XD)

Hmm. That's strange. 

I looked at where I installed my PBE client, and the directory is Computer -> C -> Riot Games -> PBE. it should work anywhere, as long as it's not in the same home as where you keep your live client. 

As for the boards, did you go through the process of [creating a PBE account?](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe). Click "I want to help!" and it should take you to the account creation process. And, for the sake of making sure we're all on the same page, you're trying to access the [PBE boards](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback)? I know sometimes I end up trying to log into the incorrect boards, and try logging into EUW when I want NA on live. >_> 

Good luck with the troubleshooting, and let me know when you sort things out. If you'd like, you can add me on PBE, and I'd be happy to help if you have any questions regarding the PBE realm. My summoner name there is the same as it is on live. :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=OME2cINM,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2015-06-12T17:01:25.659+0000)

Click "I want to help!" and it should take you to the account creation process. And, for the sake of making sure we're all on the same page, you're trying to access the [PBE boards](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback)? I know sometimes I end up trying to log into the incorrect boards, and try logging into EUW when I want NA on live. >_>

So I tried downloading PBE on a different computer and it worked. It's safe to say that the problem is my computer that I keep trying to download it on. So i just need to figure out what the particular problem is and all is good. Thanks for all the help.
Thanks for the update! Best of luck!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=OME2cINM,comment-id=00000000000100000000,timestamp=2015-07-04T01:28:32.178+0000)
>
> Thanks for the update! Best of luck!

seriously?  that's the only post you make in the Report a Bug boards?  Nothing on all the disconnected from pvp.net stuff?  is it just not a concern AT ALL?  PBE is massively more important than the stability of the actual live servers...

Hey Hepolite! 

Just wanted to jump in and clarify - I don't handle pvp.net - I'm actually a Content QA Analyst on the skins team who knows a bit about the installation process of PBE. :]

Can i ask a favor? Please, go over to the Tech team and slap the manager. There is a serious lag issue that is making a ton of people not be able to play and we aren't getting a single response to the problem. Not even a notice or anything.
I've actually even tried to download the file from a different computer from a flash drive, and make it work from there, but it still doesn't work...
extract the .zip file on your desktop it worked for me I just put them in a folder called PBE.
